headline: The Estée Lauder Companies Announces BEAUTY&YOU India 2025 Winners, Celebrating the Next Generation of Beauty Entrepreneurs
summary: NEW YORK & MUMBAI, India, October 08, 2025--The Estée Lauder Companies Inc. (NYSE: EL) announced yesterday the winners of BEAUTY&YOU India 2025. This year’s program, supported by the Government of India’s Startup India and launch partner Nykaa, highlighted the emerging talent reimagining the future of beauty in India.

content.title: The Estée Lauder Companies Announces BEAUTY&YOU India 2025 Winners, Celebrating the Next Generation of Beauty Entrepreneurs
content.summary: NEW YORK & MUMBAI, India, October 08, 2025--The Estée Lauder Companies Inc. (NYSE: EL) announced yesterday the winners of BEAUTY&YOU India 2025. This year’s program, supported by the Government of India’s Startup India and launch partner Nykaa, highlighted the emerging talent reimagining the future of beauty in India.

thumbnail.caption: From L to R: Jaspreet Singh Gulati, Founder & Director, HiTech Formulations; Aparna Saxena, Founder & CEO, Antinorm; Stéphane de La Faverie, President & CEO, The Estée Lauder Companies; Harsha Soundararajan, Founder, Mimiq; Khanak Gupta, Co-Founder & CEO, Sohrai Beauty; and Rohan Vaziralli, General Manager, The Estée Lauder Companies India.
